headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major data points.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, inputs, and tabular data.

mono.usage: Transaction IDs, code snippets, or technical details.

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600&family=Syne:wght@700;800&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400&display=swap');

usage_rules: Use Primary (#CCFF00) ONLY for 'You are owed' and main CTAs.
Use Destructive (#FF003C) for 'You owe' and delete actions.
Backgrounds must be deep black (#050505), not gray.
Borders should be subtle (#262626) unless active.

spacing.rule: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).

grid_system.mobile: Single column (grid-cols-1) with bottom sheet navigation.

containers.alignment: Center on desktop, full width on mobile.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or Pill-shaped (choose one consistency). Let's go with Pill-shaped for a friendly finance vibe.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border, no shadow by default.
cards.classes: bg-card border-border rounded-xl hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.classes: bg-secondary/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-lg h-12

navigation.mobile: Bottom fixed bar with blur effect (glassmorphism).
navigation.desktop: Top sticky header with minimal links.

ads.style: Native integration. Must look exactly like a Trip Card but with a 'Sponsored' badge.
ads.badge_classes: bg-white/10 text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded uppercase tracking-widest text-muted-foreground

visual_enhancers.gradients: No full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in card backgrounds for 'Trips'.
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise overlay to the main background to kill the digital flatness.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to the top of src/index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors defined in this JSON. Ensure 'darkMode' is set to 'class'.
3. OVERRIDE CSS VARIABLES: Replace the contents of the @layer base :root and .dark in src/index.css with the palette values provided here.
4. COMPONENT STYLING: When using Shadcn components, override their default radius and border colors to match the 'cards' and 'buttons' specs.
5. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' approach for the main dashboard. Do not just stack cards vertically.
6. ADS: Implement ad slots as native components within the feed. Do not use standard banner sizes (728x90). Make them look like content.
7. MOTION: Wrap page transitions and list items with Framer Motion <motion.div>.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) for testing.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
